aboutUs.paragraph: The Universal Forums is a community-driven organization focused on collecting and rating difficulties on custom levels of the game ADOFAI.

shoutOut.paragraph: Website made by the TUF Dev Team, development led by Adrian and t3ww. Rework by V0W4N. Code of this website is made available on GitHub.
